item.title: yfinance (Post 2024-05-11_00)
item.description: yfinance is a Python Library to retrieve investment data from the yfinance website Python Code to Download Daily Adjusted Closing Prices fo for Multiple Tickers import yfiance as yf import pandas as pd tickers= ["AGG", "TIP", "MUB", "PFF", "IVV", "IWN", "EFA", "EEM", "IYR"] startDate="2022-12-31" endDate="2023-12-31" df = yf.download(tickers, start=startDate, end=endDate, interval="1d") adj_close_df=df["Adj Close"] Unfortunately, the Tickers are placed into the df alphabetically, rather than in the order in the list.
